title: HTTPS - Phase I
user_story:
As an API user\
I want to have the option to use an encrypted connection\
So I can be sure that all my requests are actually going through the More Cars servers\
And are not intercepted or manipulated
description:
* every route is accessible via HTTPS, e.g. `https://api.more-cars.net/brands`
* in this iteration every route is also still available via HTTP, e.g. `http://api.more-cars.net/brands`
* there are no automatic redirects from one protocol to the other
* in this iteration the certificates donâ€™t need to be valid for any environment
